<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Field Artillery](/Feats.aspx?ID=3226) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 129</row>

**Archetype** [Artillerist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=115)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

While castles are generally obliging enough to stay in one place, out in the field positioning is of paramount importance—a gun in the wrong place is worse than useless. You can Interact with an adjacent mounted [siege weapon](/equipment/siege-weapons) to increase its Speed by 10 feet for one round.
name: Field Artillery
